title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 105.6 - Restrictions as to Thruway lands
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 105.6 - Restrictions as to Thruway lands

State Regulations

Notwithstanding the purpose for which it may be erected or
the persons to whom it may be visible, no advertising device shall be erected
or maintained on lands under the jurisdiction of the Thruway Authority except
devices erected by the Thruway Authority or with the consent of the Thruway

Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
105.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
